name: Desert War
description:
The prince of the sands returned to his homeland and found there hordes of terrible creatures that destroyed the prince's castle and now encroach on his life, but he is ready to fight and defend himself and his desert.

Desert War - 2d slasher, in this game you slash enemies with your sword, use magic, rolls and your reaction to defeat enemies who are growing with each new wave, but you also pump your hero, his weapons and magic.

Features of the game:
- Endless Game
- Pixel Art
- Music
